generated_doNotEdit.title: Open Door Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to open doors. Requires the mob to be able to path through doors, otherwise the mob won't even want to try opening them.

fields.title: Close Door After
fields.description: If true, the mob will close the door after opening it and going through it

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
